title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.37 - Towing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 182.37 - Towing

State Regulations

Emergency service and towing vehicles are allowed to enter
upon and operate within the parkway system in direct response to calls for
assistance. When responding to a service call, such vehicles shall enter the
parkway system at the entrance nearest to the disabled vehicle and shall leave
at the nearest exit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
182.37

Adopted

New

York State Register February 14, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 7, eff. 2/14/2024

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
